title: Are these pictures good for a K-pop online audition ? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yeah they are, but I think if you get someone to take it for you it will look much more clear and nice. They also want a full picture to see how your body is and your ankles because you will be wearing skirts when you are performing. So I would prefer you take a full picture
Yes, they’re good photos. But you should have full pictures and also take a full body photo. Also, I recommend using your school photos (but that’s just my opinion). Hope this helped!
Those two are good, but you might want to add a full body shot so that they can see your body shape and figure.
